name: Hell Hole: Escape
description:
If for any reason the game will not load, play it here:

http://www.playpixelpocalypse.com/jumpgame

An evil being has thrown you down a deep, dark hole filled with deadly traps. Can you escape?

Hell Hole: Escape is a one touch jumping game where the goal is to score as many points as possible. Jumping faster extends your combo, and the higher the combo the higher the score.

Controls:

Click or press W, Up, or Space to jump.

Hold jump in order to jump higher.

Jump again quickly after landing on the opposite wall to gain a combo.

Credits

Programmed by bazola

Art and original design by Robby Schieffer

Music by tylersrevenge - "mylostbeat"

Music by Naram - "9 Mile"

Music by Landwhale - "Noise Haters"

Thanks for playing!
